oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Crosby, Frances J. and Dan D. Emmett
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dixie for the Union
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Crossed stars and stripes on white background with blue lettering and red border.
Words by Frances J. Crosby and melody by Dan D. Emmett. This arrangement for quartet by S. Lasar.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Flags; United States -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Songs and music
Capturing the Flag
